components.label: Privileges
components.tooltip:
Please enter the Privileges to be used
A Privilege can be used to define or Access different features/Flows within the Application

components.label: Name
components.tooltip: Please enter the Privilege Name to be used

components.label: Permission
components.tooltip: Please select the Highest Level of Permissions the Privilege may Have

components.label: Roles
components.tooltip:
A Role is collection of Privileges that can be given for users.
Each Role will have a set of Privileges which can associated to different Capabilities of the Application

components.label: Name
components.tooltip: Please enter the Name of the Role

components.label: Name
components.tooltip: Select the Privilege which the Role should have

components.label: Permission
components.tooltip: Select the Permission for the Privilege which needs to be provided

validate.custom:
valid =
  input <= instance.component.values[instance.component.values.length - 1].value
    ? true
    : "Please select a valid permission level";

components.title: Form Type
components.tooltip:
An Form Type is a Data Collection inside the Application and Represents what the File Object will contain
Each Form Type Represents can contain a Form which will modify Data inside the File.
components.label: Entities
HTML
components.content:
Form Types
An Form Type is a Data Collection inside the Application and Represents what the File Object will contain

Each Form Type Represents can contain a Form which will modify Data inside the File.

components.label: Name
components.tooltip: The Name for the Form Type used in the Application

components.label: Actual Participant ROle Key

components.label: Attachment Field
components.tooltip: Uploaded files from chat will be attached to this field

components.label: RYG Rule
components.tooltip:
The RYG Rule for the Form Type
This is a javascript rule which is used to return the Colour Based on any and all Fields in the Form Type
